channel.title: How to set custom items added to client move with character not just an image!
channel.description: ok i added 100s of customs to my server! the weps work fine because i added ids in client.java (server side) with animation. what i need to do is set animation.... i think? eg. the armor because boots, helm, pl8, legs are all still. eg when i move my legs boots stay together while my legs are moving and same with boots. how do i fix this?

item.title: How to set custom items added to client move with character not just an image!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

number 2! i have seen the [tuts] no help
can u please help me. DO i really need to redo models!

item.title: How to set custom items added to client move with character not just an image!
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

Ok I don’t get what your saying so these are your options:

  1. If customs are equiped in the weapon slot add them to item.java under the correct spot.

  2. If items have no animation add the animation using DatMaker. If this is your problem then wrong section mate. Check SilentCJ’s TUT in the Modelling help section.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2009, 02:56:09 am[/size][hr][quote=“b15, post:3, topic:319896”]if u want to see go to (Hidden for advertising Purposes)[/quote]

Remove link I don’t think your allowed. May be considered advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: How to set custom items added to client move with character not just an image!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

no it goes in the right place. ur talking about putting the id into item4 and in right section. ( i have done that). what i need to do know is, make is so when i move my leg up the armor goes with my leg. if i were to move my leg in game the platelegs would stay facing down. if u want to see go to www.b15servebeer.webs.com
